title: Version 55 preview-to-production promotion documentation and records (no code/config changes)

requirements.summary: Document and attest that Version 55 preview build was promoted to production as a deployment-only operation with no code/config changes.
acceptanceCriteria: Promotion is executed as a deployment-only operation (no application code changes, no configuration changes).
The production/live frontend canister serves the app successfully at the default IC URL.
The production/live deployment uses the same build artifacts as the current preview build (Version 55).

file_operations.description: Create the Version 55 preview-to-production promotion record (or update if it already exists) and include an explicit "Promotion Execution" section capturing that promotion used the existing Version 55 preview artifacts and introduced NO application code/config changes.

Add/confirm documentation guidance that the promotion step is deployment-only and must not introduce any application code or configuration changes, and that Version 55 promotion execution details must be recorded in the version-specific promotion record.

requirements.summary: Complete and record the Version 55 pre-publish verification checklist and outcomes in a promotion record markdown file.
acceptanceCriteria: A promotion record exists for Version 55 under `frontend/docs/promotions/` and includes completed checklist sections for the key flows listed in `frontend/docs/publish-preview-to-production.md`.
The promotion record contains explicit attestation statements that application code changes = NONE and configuration changes = NONE.
The promotion record includes an overall status and a recommendation (PROCEED WITH PROMOTION / DO NOT PROMOTE).

file_operations.description: Create `frontend/docs/promotions/version-55-preview-to-production.md` based on the existing promotion record templates, including: PASS/PASS WITH NOTES/FAIL outcomes per checklist section in `frontend/docs/publish-preview-to-production.md`, issue classification (critical/non-critical), overall status, recommendation, and explicit attestations: application code changes = NONE; configuration changes = NONE.

requirements.summary: Record and surface the Version 55 production access details (frontend canister URL and backend canister ID) in deployment documentation.
acceptanceCriteria: A production deployment record for Version 55 exists under `frontend/docs/deployments/` and includes: frontend canister ID, default IC URL, and backend canister ID.
The documented production URL loads the app and the frontend can reach the backend canister without showing a backend connectivity error under normal conditions.

file_operations.description: Create a Version 55 production deployment record under `frontend/docs/deployments/` including frontend canister ID, default IC URL, backend canister ID, and post-deployment verification results confirming the app loads and backend connectivity is healthy under normal conditions.
Create an index file that links to the Version 55 production deployment record (and other existing deployment records) so the live links are easily discoverable from documentation.
Create an index file that links to the Version 55 promotion record (and other existing promotion records) so promotion and live access documentation are discoverable.
